Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, north of the Oceancrest MLibrary.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Municiple Library is a small public library where anyone can come to check out various books on various subjects from history to science to magic. The entrance to the library is located to the west of here, in front of a number of large statues.
